field.label: Automatic Alias Integration
field.help: When the plugin is enabled, it automatically maintains an alias called "MaliciousIPs" containing detected threat IPs. This alias can be used in firewall rules, NAT rules, or other OPNsense features.

field.label: Enable Alias Updates
field.help: Automatically update the "MaliciousIPs" alias when threats are detected

field.label: Include Suspicious IPs
field.help: Include suspicious IPs in addition to malicious ones

field.label: Maximum Recent Hosts
field.help: Include only the X most recent and dangerous hosts (sorted by detection time and abuse score)
